workflow.name: Verify emails & generate resume cards with VerifiEmail, HTML CSS to image & Gmail
workflow.description:
## Resume Email Verifier & Visual Card Generator
### **Overview**
Verify candidate emails and auto-generate beautiful resume cards. Validates deliverability, creates professional PNG cards, and emails them instantly.

## What This Workflow Does

Automatically validate candidate email addresses and generate stunning, personalized resume snapshot cards delivered instantly via email. Perfect for recruitment platforms, job boards, HR automation, and career services.

## Key Features

‚úÖ **Advanced Email Verification** - Validates deliverability, checks MX records, detects disposable emails
‚úÖ **Beautiful Visual Cards** - Generates professional 600x400px PNG resume cards with gradient backgrounds
‚úÖ **Smart Routing** - Separate paths for valid/invalid emails with appropriate notifications
‚úÖ **Professional Emails** - HTML-formatted emails with personalized content and attachments
‚úÖ **Ready to Use** - Comprehensive documentation with sticky notes explaining each step

## Perfect For

- Recruitment platforms verifying applicant emails
- Job boards creating visual resume confirmations
- HR departments streamlining candidate verification
- Career fairs generating instant digital resume cards
- Portfolio sites validating users and creating shareable snapshots
- Educational institutions providing students with verified digital resumes

## What You'll Need

1. **VerifiEmail Account** - Email verification (https://verifi.email)
2. **htmlcsstoimage.com Account** - Image generation (https://htmlcsstoimg.com)
3. **Gmail Account** - Email delivery (free with Gmail API)

## Quick Start

1. Import workflow into n8n
2. Set up three credentials (Gmail OAuth2, VerifiEmail API, htmlcsstoimg API)
3. Activate workflow and copy webhook URL
4. Send POST requests with resume data
5. Candidates receive beautiful resume cards via email!

## Sample Input

```json
{
  "name": "John Doe",
  "email": "john@example.com",
  "role": "Frontend Developer",
  "skills": "React, JavaScript, Tailwind CSS, Git"
}
```

## Sample Output

- Valid emails: Professional email with resume card PNG attachment
- Invalid emails: Helpful error notification with troubleshooting tips
- Average processing time: 3-5 seconds

## Workflow Includes

- 9 pre-configured nodes with detailed sticky notes
- Complete documentation explaining each step
- Error handling for both valid and invalid paths
- Customizable HTML template for branding
- Professional email templates ready to use

## Easy Customization

- Change card colors and branding in HTML template
- Modify email templates for your company style
- Adjust validation rules in Set node
- Add additional data fields as needed

Perfect for startups, agencies, and enterprises looking to automate resume processing and email verification!
```

workflow.name: Resume verification workflow automation

parameters.content:
## üü© WEBHOOK TRIGGER

**Expected Payload:**
```json
{
  "name": "John Doe",
  "email": "john@gmail.com",
  "role": "Frontend Developer",
  "skills": "React, JavaScript, Tailwind, Git"
}
```

‚úÖ **Test with:** Postman, cURL, or any HTTP client

## ‚öôÔ∏è CREDENTIALS SETUP GUIDE

#### 1Ô∏è‚É£ **Gmail OAuth2**
- Go to: Credentials ‚Üí Add Credential
- Type: Gmail OAuth2

#### 2Ô∏è‚É£ **VerifiEmail API**
- Sign up at: https://verifi.email
- Get API Key from dashboard

#### 3Ô∏è‚É£ **HTML/CSS to Image**
- Sign up at: https://htmlcsstoimg.com
- Get User ID + API Key

üí° **All three credentials are REQUIRED** for this workflow to function!

## üü¶ EMAIL VERIFICATION SERVICE

**Input:** `{{ $json.email }}`

**Verification Checks:**
‚úì **RFC Compliance** - Valid email format
‚úì **MX Records** - Domain has mail servers
‚úì **Deliverability** - Mailbox exists and active
‚úì **Spoof Detection** - Not a fake/temporary email
‚úì **Disposable Check** - Not from temporary email services

## üüß CONDITIONAL ROUTING LOGIC

**Condition:**
```javascript
$json.valid === true
```

**Flow Control:**

### ‚úÖ **TRUE Branch** (Top Output)
1. ‚Üí Merge with resume data
2. ‚Üí Generate image
3. ‚Üí Send success email with card

### ‚ùå **FALSE Branch** (Bottom Output)
1. ‚Üí Send invalid email notice
2. ‚Üí Workflow ends

## üü™ VISUAL CARD GENERATION

**Input Data:**
- `{{ $json.name }}` - Candidate name
- `{{ $json.role }}` - Job role/title
- `{{ $json.skills }}` - Skills list
- `{{ $json.email }}` - Verified email

parameters.message:
=

Hi {{ $('Set - Prepare Resume Data').item.json.name }}! üëã

Great news! Your email has been successfully verified. ‚úÖ

Here's your personalized resume snapshot card. Feel free to use it on your portfolio, LinkedIn, or share it with potential employers!

Your resume card is attached below üìé

Best regards,
Resume Verification Team
parameters.subject: Your Verified Resume Snapshot Card üéâ

parameters.content:
## üü™ SUCCESS EMAIL DELIVERY

**Attachment:**
- Binary data from HTTP Request node
- File: Resume card PNG image
- Downloaded from htmlcsstoimg.com URL

**Email Features:**
‚úÖ Personalized content
‚úÖ Professional HTML styling
‚úÖ Verification badge shown
‚úÖ Resume card attached as PNG
‚úÖ Mobile-responsive design

parameters.message:
=

Hi {{ $('Set - Prepare Resume Data').item.json.name }},

Unfortunately, we couldn't verify the email address you provided: {{ $('Set - Prepare Resume Data').item.json.email }}

‚ö†Ô∏è Please check:

  • Email spelling and format
  • Domain name is correct
  • Email account is active

Feel free to submit again with the correct email address.

Best regards,
Resume Verification Team
parameters.subject: Email Verification Failed ‚ö†Ô∏è

parameters.content:
## üü• INVALID EMAIL HANDLER

**Common Failure Reasons:**
‚ùå **Typo in email** - Spelling mistake
‚ùå **Invalid domain** - Domain doesn't exist
‚ùå **Disposable email** - Temporary email service
‚ùå **Mailbox doesn't exist** - Email not active
‚ùå **No MX records** - Domain has no mail servers

**Error Handling Benefits:**
‚úÖ User-friendly error message
‚úÖ Clear troubleshooting steps
‚úÖ Encourages correction and resubmission
‚úÖ Maintains professional communication
‚úÖ Prevents silent failures

## üìä WORKFLOW OVERVIEW

### **Resume Verification & Visual Card Generator**

### üéØ **Purpose:**
Automatically verify candidate emails and generate beautiful, personalized resume snapshot cards delivered via email.

### üìã **Workflow Steps:**

1Ô∏è‚É£ **Webhook Trigger** - Receive resume data via POST request
2Ô∏è‚É£ **Data Cleaning** - Extract and format candidate information
3Ô∏è‚É£ **Email Verification** - Validate email deliverability (VerifiEmail API)
4Ô∏è‚É£ **Conditional Logic** - Route based on validation result
5Ô∏è‚É£ **Data Merge** - Combine resume + validation data (valid only)
6Ô∏è‚É£ **Image Generation** - Create visual resume card (htmlcsstoimg.com)
7Ô∏è‚É£ **Download Image** - Fetch PNG for email attachment
8Ô∏è‚É£ **Email Delivery** - Send card to valid emails OR error to invalid

## üì• IMAGE DOWNLOAD

**Input:** `{{ $json.image_url }}`
- URL from HTML/CSS to Image node
- Example: `https://hcti.io/v1/image/abc123...`

**Process:**
1. Receives image URL from previous node
2. Makes GET request to download image
3. Stores as binary data in `data` field
4. Passes to Gmail for attachment

parameters.html_content:
=

{{ $json.name }}

{{ $json.role }}

üõ†Ô∏è Skills & Technologies

{{ $json.skills }}

‚úì EMAIL VERIFIED

{{ $json.email }}

workflow.description: Automatically verify candidate emails and generate beautiful resume snapshot cards. Uses VerifiEmail for validation and htmlcsstoimage.com to create professional visual cards delivered via Gmail.

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.
